title: Governance Integrity Root Manifest (GIRM) V01
description: Defines the mandatory structure for the manifest used by GIRAM to verify system integrity.

manifestVersion.description: Version of this manifest schema (e.g., V01.0)

signingKeyID.description: Identifier for the key used to sign this manifest, cross-referenced against GRTA.

timestampUTC.description: The time the manifest was cryptographically committed.

cryptoPolicyRef.description: Reference pointer to the SCPI version used for artifact hashing (e.g., SCPI-T03).

criticalArtifacts.description: List of files and components requiring integrity checks.

path.description: System absolute path to the artifact.

expectedHash.description: The canonical expected hash of the artifact content.

hashAlgorithm.description: The specific algorithm used to generate the expected hash (e.g., KECCAK-512, SHAH-256).
